summary: Encompassing various domains such as natural environments, human organizations, arts, society, and business, this theme explores the concept of ecosystems. It delves into how ecosystems transcend spatial and temporal boundaries, requiring intentional and multidisciplinary design for development. Moreover, profiles like Jan Hein Hoogstad (alias yeehaa), a leader in design and tech, are featured, showcasing key influencers in this field.
excerpt: Ecosystem now describes various forms of organizations beyond natural environments, reflecting a shift in understanding human organizations as living systems transcending time and space requiring design for development.
